basics.name: Sydney Hashiro
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Drive and maintain on-brand visual displays, planogram compliance, and timely resets to maximize guest experience and sales. Partner with cross-functional teams to adapt priorities and ensure a safe, organized sales floor.
highlights: Collaborated with leaders and peers to prioritize sets and adjust workload based on trailer reports and store needs
Maintained brand standards by flexing product, updating signing, and ensuring clean, shoppable presentations
Supported transitions by prepping areas in advance, coordinating product pulls, and completing sets ahead of deadline
Mentored new team members on safety, equipment use, and interpreting workload documents
Used Zebra devices to track progress, locate fixtures, and communicate set completions

work.company: University of Hawaii at Hilo and Manoa
work.summary: Monitored aquatic facilities to ensure guest safety, enforced rules, and responded to emergencies with CPR and first aid. Instructed swim lessons for individuals and groups of all ages while maintaining a clean and hazard-free pool environment.
highlights: Supervised swimmers and enforced safety protocols to prevent accidents and injuries
Led swim instruction and lifeguard/CPR certification classes for students of all ages
Maintained pool cleanliness and logged chemical readings to meet health standards
Advised new swimmers on proper techniques and confidence-building strategies
Collaborated with peers to identify and address safety concerns proactively

volunteer.summary: Instructed swim lessons for individuals and groups of all ages while maintaining a clean and hazard-free pool environment.
Helped guide patients through check-in and post-vaccine observation, ensured proper safety protocols, and provided a calm and welcoming environment for all attendees.
